languages.text: "Более того, приговоренн{mf|ый|ая} привел{mf||а} в засекреченную систему флот своих подельников, нанесших непоправимый ущерб священной подати. В результате внутренней грызни между негодяями и приговоренн{mf|ым|ой} были {d|Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}уничтожены и похищены баржи{/d}, чей предварительный объем груза равняется двум десяткам лет податей с трех миров класса альфа {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}десятинного ранга{/g} Экзактис Прима".

traits.locale_text: "Более того, приговоренн{mf|ый|ая} привел{mf||а} в засекреченную систему флот своих подельников, нанесших непоправимый ущерб священной подати. В результате внутренней грызни между негодяями и приговоренн{mf|ым|ой} были уничтожены и похищены баржи с десятиной объемом не менее девяти тысяч стандартизированных единиц, что равняется двум десяткам лет податей с трех миров класса альфа {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}десятинного ранга{/g} Экзактис Прима".

"Более того, приговоренн{mf|ый|ая} привел{mf||а} в засекреченную систему флот своих подельников, нанесших непоправимый ущерб священной подати. В результате внутренней грызни между негодяями и приговоренн{mf|ым|ой} были {d|Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}уничтожены и похищены баржи{/d}, чей предварительный объем груза равняется двум десяткам лет податей с трех миров класса альфа {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}десятинного ранга{/g} Экзактис Прима".

languages.text: "In addition, the defendant led a fleet of {mf|his|her} associates into a classified system, causing irreparable damage to the sacred tribute. As a result of internal squabbling between the ruffians and the defendant, a number of barges were {d|Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}destroyed or stolen{/d}, their total estimated tithe volume being the equivalent of two decades' worth of payments from three Alpha-class, Exactis Prima {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}tithe grade{/g} worlds."
languages.original_text: "Более того, приговоренн{mf|ый|ая} привел{mf||а} в засекреченную систему флот своих подельников, нанесших непоправимый ущерб священной подати. В результате внутренней грызни между негодяями и приговоренн{mf|ым|ой} были {d|Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}уничтожены и похищены баржи{/d}, чей предварительный объем груза равняется двум десяткам лет податей с трех миров класса альфа {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}десятинного ранга{/g} Экзактис Прима".

traits.locale_text: "In addition, the defendant led a fleet of {mf|his|her} associates into a classified system, causing irreparable damage to the sacred tribute. As a result of internal squabbling between the ruffians and the defendant, a number of barges were {d|Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}destroyed or stolen{/d}, their total estimated tithe volume being the equivalent of two decades' worth of payments from three Alpha-class, Exactis Prima {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}tithe grade{/g} worlds."

"In addition, the defendant led a fleet of {mf|his|her} associates into a classified system, causing irreparable damage to the sacred tribute. As a result of internal squabbling between the ruffians and the defendant, a number of barges were {d|Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}destroyed or stolen{/d}, their total estimated tithe volume being the equivalent of two decades' worth of payments from three Alpha-class, Exactis Prima {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}tithe grade{/g} worlds."

"In addition, the defendant led a fleet of his associates into a classified system, causing irreparable damage to the sacred tribute. As a result of internal squabbling between the ruffians and the defendant, tithe barges carrying at least nine thousand standardised units were destroyed and stolen — the equivalent of two decades' worth of payments from three Exactis Prima tithe grade worlds."

"In addition, the defendant led a fleet of {mf|his|her} associates into a classified system, causing irreparable damage to the sacred tribute. As a result of internal squabbling between the ruffians and the defendant, a number of barges were {d|Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}destroyed or stolen{/d}, their total estimated tithe volume being the equivalent of two decades' worth of payments from three Alpha-class, Exactis Prima {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}tithe grade{/g} worlds."

"In addition, the defendant led a fleet of {mf|his|her} associates into a classified system, causing irreparable damage to the sacred tribute. As a result of internal squabbling between the ruffians and the defendant, a number of barges were {d|Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}destroyed or stolen{/d}, their total estimated tithe volume being the equivalent of two decades' worth of payments from three Alpha-class, Exactis Prima {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}tithe grade{/g} worlds."

"In addition, the defendant led a fleet of {mf|his|her} associates into a classified system, causing irreparable damage to the sacred tribute. As a result of internal squabbling between the ruffians and the defendant, a number of barges were {d|Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}destroyed or stolen{/d}, their total estimated tithe volume being the equivalent of two decades' worth of payments from three Alpha-class, Exactis Prima {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}tithe grade{/g} worlds."

"In addition, the defendant led a fleet of {mf|his|her} associates into a classified system, causing irreparable damage to the sacred tribute. As a result of internal squabbling between the ruffians and the defendant, a number of barges were {d|Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}destroyed or stolen{/d}, their total estimated tithe volume being the equivalent of two decades' worth of payments from three Alpha-class, Exactis Prima {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}tithe grade{/g} worlds."

languages.text: "Überdies hat {mf|der|die} Angeklagte eine Flotte {mf|seiner|ihrer} Komplizen in ein geheimes System geführt und dem heiligen Tribut damit irreparablen Schaden zugefügt. Nach internen Querelen zwischen {mf|dem|der}Angeklagten und {mf|seinen|ihren} Spießgesellen wurden mehrere Schiffe {d|Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}zerstört oder gestohlen{/d}. Der geschätzte Schaden entspricht Zahlungen dreier Welten der Alpha-Klasse mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}Zehntgrad{/g} von Exactis Prima über einen Zeitraum von zwei Dekaden."
languages.original_text: "In addition, the defendant led a fleet of {mf|his|her} associates into a classified system, causing irreparable damage to the sacred tribute. As a result of internal squabbling between the ruffians and the defendant, a number of barges were {d|Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}destroyed or stolen{/d}, their total estimated tithe volume being the equivalent of two decades' worth of payments from three Alpha-class, Exactis Prima {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}tithe grade{/g} worlds."

traits.locale_text: "Überdies hat {mf|der|die} Angeklagte eine Flotte {mf|seiner|ihrer} Komplizen in ein geheimes System geführt und dem heiligen Tribut damit irreparablen Schaden zugefügt. Nach internen Querelen zwischen {mf|dem|der}Angeklagten und {mf|seinen|ihren} Spießgesellen wurden mehrere Schiffe |Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}zerstört oder gestohlen{/d}. Der geschätzte Schaden entspricht Zahlungen dreier Welten der Alpha-Klasse mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}Zehntgrad{/g} von Exactis Prima über einen Zeitraum von zwei Dekaden."

"Überdies hat {mf|der|die} Angeklagte eine Flotte {mf|seiner|ihrer} Komplizen in ein geheimes System geführt und dem heiligen Tribut damit irreparablen Schaden zugefügt. Nach internen Querelen zwischen {mf|dem|der} Angeklagten und {mf|seinen|ihren} Spießgesellen wurden Zehntschiffe mit mindestens neuntausend Standardeinheiten zerstört oder gestohlen ... das entspricht Zahlungen dreier Welten der Alpha-Klasse mit einem Zehntgrad von Exactis Prima über einen Zeitraum von zwei Dekaden."

"Überdies hat {mf|der|die} Angeklagte eine Flotte {mf|seiner|ihrer} Komplizen in ein geheimes System geführt und dem heiligen Tribut damit irreparablen Schaden zugefügt. Nach internen Querelen zwischen {mf|dem|der} Angeklagten und {mf|seinen|ihren} Spießgesellen wurden Zehntschiffe mit mindestens neuntausend Standardeinheiten zerstört oder gestohlen ... das entspricht Zahlungen dreier Welten der Alpha-Klasse mit einem Zehntgrad von Exactis Prima über einen Zeitraum von zwei Dekaden."

"Überdies hat {mf|der|die} Angeklagte eine Flotte {mf|seiner|ihrer} Komplizen in ein geheimes System geführt und dem heiligen Tribut damit irreparablen Schaden zugefügt. Nach internen Querelen zwischen {mf|dem|der} Angeklagten und {mf|seinen|ihren} Spießgesellen wurden Zehntschiffe mit mindestens neuntausend Standardeinheiten zerstört oder gestohlen ... das entspricht Zahlungen dreier Welten der Alpha-Klasse mit einem Zehntgrad von Exactis Prima über einen Zeitraum von zwei Dekaden."

languages.text: « En outre, l'{mf|accusé|accusée} a mené une flotte de ses complices jusqu'à un système classé confidentiel au prix de dégâts irréparables au tribut sacré. À la suite de querelles intestines entre ces malandrins et l'{mf|accusé|accusée}, plusieurs barges ont été {d|Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}détruites ou volées{/d}. Selon nos estimations, la dîme qu'elles transportaient était d'une valeur équivalente à deux décennies de paiements de {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}niveau{/g} Exactis Prima en provenance de trois mondes de classe Alpha. »
languages.original_text: "In addition, the defendant led a fleet of {mf|his|her} associates into a classified system, causing irreparable damage to the sacred tribute. As a result of internal squabbling between the ruffians and the defendant, a number of barges were {d|Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}destroyed or stolen{/d}, their total estimated tithe volume being the equivalent of two decades' worth of payments from three Alpha-class, Exactis Prima {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}tithe grade{/g} worlds."

traits.locale_text: « En outre, l'{mf|accusé|accusée} a mené une flotte de ses complices jusqu'à un système classé confidentiel au prix de dégâts irréparables au tribut sacré. À la suite de querelles intestines entre ces malandrins et l'{mf|accusé|accusée}, plusieurs barges ont été {d|Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}détruites ou volées{/d}. Selon nos estimations, la dîme qu'elles transportaient était d'une valeur équivalente à deux décennies de paiements de {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}niveau{/g} Exactis Prima en provenance de trois mondes de classe Alpha. »

« En outre, l'{mf|accusé|accusée} a mené une flotte de ses complices jusqu'à un système classé confidentiel au prix de dégâts irréparables au tribut sacré. À la suite de querelles intestines entre ces malandrins et l'{mf|accusé|accusée}, des barges transportant au moins neuf mille unités standardisées de la dîme ont été détruites ou volées, soit l'équivalent de deux décennies de paiements d'une dîme Exactis Prima en provenance de trois mondes de classe Alpha. »

« En outre, l'{mf|accusé|accusée} a mené une flotte de ses complices jusqu'à un système classé confidentiel au prix de dégâts irréparables au tribut sacré. À la suite de querelles intestines entre ces malandrins et l'{mf|accusé|accusée}, des barges transportant au moins neuf mille unités standardisées de la dîme ont été détruites ou volées, soit l'équivalent de deux décennies de paiements d'une dîme Exactis Prima en provenance de trois mondes de classe Alpha. »

« En outre, l'{mf|accusé|accusée} a mené une flotte de ses complices jusqu'à un système classé confidentiel au prix de dégâts irréparables au tribut sacré. À la suite de querelles intestines entre ces malandrins et l'{mf|accusé|accusée}, des barges transportant au moins neuf mille unités standardisées de la dîme ont été détruites ou volées, soit l'équivalent de deux décennies de paiements d'une dîme Exactis Prima en provenance de trois mondes de classe Alpha. »

« En outre, l'{mf|accusé|accusée} a mené une flotte de ses complices jusqu'à un système classé confidentiel au prix de dégâts irréparables au tribut sacré. À la suite de querelles intestines entre ces malandrins et l'{mf|accusé|accusée}, des barges transportant au moins neuf mille unités standardisées de la dîme ont été détruites ou volées, soit l'équivalent de deux décennies de paiements d'une dîme Exactis Prima en provenance de trois mondes de classe Alpha. »

languages.text: “不仅如此，被告与{mf|他|她}的同谋率领舰队，前往某个机密星系，对其中的神圣什一税造成了无法弥补的损害。由于被告与同谋之间发生内部冲突，许多载有什一税的货船遭到{d|Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}摧毁、盗窃{/d}，上面的资源相当于三个阿尔法级世界，也就是{g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}税务级别{/g}为‘第一等上级’的世界共计二十年的什一税税额。”
languages.original_text: "In addition, the defendant led a fleet of {mf|his|her} associates into a classified system, causing irreparable damage to the sacred tribute. As a result of internal squabbling between the ruffians and the defendant, a number of barges were {d|Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}destroyed or stolen{/d}, their total estimated tithe volume being the equivalent of two decades' worth of payments from three Alpha-class, Exactis Prima {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}tithe grade{/g} worlds."

traits.locale_text: “不仅如此，被告与{mf|他|她}的同谋率领舰队，前往某个机密星系，对其中的神圣什一税造成了无法弥补的损害。由于被告与同谋之间发生内部冲突，许多载有什一税的货船遭到{d|Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}摧毁、盗窃{/d}，上面的资源相当于三个阿尔法级世界，也就是{g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}税务级别{/g}为‘第一等上级’的世界共计二十年的什一税税额。”
“不仅如此，被告与{mf|他|她}的同谋率领舰队，前往某个机密星系，对其中的神圣什一税造成了无法弥补的损害。由于被告与同谋之间发生内部冲突，载有至少九千个标准单位的什一税货船遭到摧毁、盗窃。这相当于三个阿尔法级世界，也就是税务级别为‘第一等上级’的世界二十年的什一税税额。”
“不仅如此，被告与{mf|他|她}的同谋率领舰队，前往某个机密星系，对其中的神圣什一税造成了无法弥补的损害。由于被告与同谋之间发生内部冲突，载有至少九千个标准单位的什一税货船遭到摧毁、盗窃。这相当于三个阿尔法级世界，也就是税务级别为‘第一等上级’的世界二十年的什一税税额。”

languages.text: «Asimismo, {mf|el|la} acusad{mf|o|a} condujo a una flota de sus socios a un sistema clasificado, causando daños irreparables al santo tributo. Como resultado de las diferencias internas entre los rufianes y {mf|el|la} acusad{mf|o|a}, una serie de barcazas fueron {d|Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}destruidas o robadas{/d}, ocasionando pérdidas del diezmo equivalentes a dos décadas de pagos de tres mundos clase Alfa y {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}categoría de diezmo{/g} Exactis Prima».
languages.original_text: "In addition, the defendant led a fleet of {mf|his|her} associates into a classified system, causing irreparable damage to the sacred tribute. As a result of internal squabbling between the ruffians and the defendant, a number of barges were {d|Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}destroyed or stolen{/d}, their total estimated tithe volume being the equivalent of two decades' worth of payments from three Alpha-class, Exactis Prima {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}tithe grade{/g} worlds."

traits.locale_text: «Asimismo, {mf|el|la} acusad{mf|o|a} condujo a una flota de sus socios a un sistema clasificado, causando daños irreparables al santo tributo. Como resultado de las diferencias internas entre los rufianes y {mf|el|la} acusad{mf|o|a}, una serie de barcazas fueron {d|Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}destruidas o robadas{/d}, ocasionando pérdidas del diezmo equivalentes a dos décadas de pagos de tres mundos clase Alfa y {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}categoría de diezmo{/g} Exactis Prima».

«Asimismo, {mf|el|la} acusad{mf|o|a} condujo a una flota de sus socios a un sistema clasificado, causando daños irreparables al santo tributo. Como resultado de las diferencias internas entre los rufianes y {mf|el|la} acusad{mf|o|a}, naves del diezmo con al menos nueve mil unidades estandarizadas fueron destruidas o robadas. Esto equivale a dos décadas de pagos de tres mundos clase Alfa y categoría de diezmo Exactis Prima».

«Asimismo, {mf|el|la} acusad{mf|o|a} condujo a una flota de sus socios a un sistema clasificado, causando daños irreparables al santo tributo. Como resultado de las diferencias internas entre los rufianes y {mf|el|la} acusad{mf|o|a}, naves del diezmo con al menos nueve mil unidades estandarizadas fueron destruidas o robadas. Esto equivale a dos décadas de pagos de tres mundos clase Alfa y categoría de diezmo Exactis Prima».

languages.text: 「さらに、被告は仲間の艦隊を率いて機密システムに侵入し、聖なる租税に回復不能な損害を与えました。ならず者たちと被告の内部抗争により、複数の荷船が{d|Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}破壊または盗難{/d}に遭いました。それらの推定租税額の合計は、アルファ級エキザクティス・プリマ{g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}租税等級{/g}の3惑星からの20年分の支払いに相当します」
languages.original_text: "In addition, the defendant led a fleet of {mf|his|her} associates into a classified system, causing irreparable damage to the sacred tribute. As a result of internal squabbling between the ruffians and the defendant, a number of barges were {d|Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}destroyed or stolen{/d}, their total estimated tithe volume being the equivalent of two decades' worth of payments from three Alpha-class, Exactis Prima {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}tithe grade{/g} worlds."

traits.locale_text: 「さらに、被告は仲間の艦隊を率いて機密システムに侵入し、聖なる租税に回復不能な損害を与えました。ならず者たちと被告の内部抗争により、複数の荷船が{d|Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}破壊または盗難{/d}に遭いました。それらの推定租税額の合計は、アルファ級エキザクティス・プリマ{g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}租税等級{/g}の3惑星からの20年分の支払いに相当します」

languages.text: "Ek olarak sanık, suç ortaklarının da bulunduğu filoyu gizli bir sisteme sokmak suretiyle kutsal aşarı dönüşü olmayan bir zarara uğratmıştır. Sanık ve avaneleri arasında yaşanan iç çekişmeler sonucunda birkaç mavnanın {d|Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}yok edilmiş veya çalınmış{/d} olup bu mavnalardaki toplam aşar miktarı, Exactis Prima {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}aşar derecesinden{/g} üç Alfa sınıfı dünyanın tam yirmi yıllık ödemesine denk düşmektedir."
languages.original_text: "In addition, the defendant led a fleet of {mf|his|her} associates into a classified system, causing irreparable damage to the sacred tribute. As a result of internal squabbling between the ruffians and the defendant, a number of barges were {d|Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}destroyed or stolen{/d}, their total estimated tithe volume being the equivalent of two decades' worth of payments from three Alpha-class, Exactis Prima {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}tithe grade{/g} worlds."

traits.locale_text: "Ek olarak sanık, suç ortaklarının da bulunduğu filoyu gizli bir sisteme sokmak suretiyle kutsal aşarı dönüşü olmayan bir zarara uğratmıştır. Sanık ve avaneleri arasında yaşanan iç çekişmeler sonucunda birkaç mavnanın {d|Encyclopedia:TW_LostTitheDecision}yok edilmiş veya çalınmış{/d} olup bu mavnalardaki toplam aşar miktarı, Exactis Prima {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGradeGlossary}aşar derecesinden{/g} üç Alfa sınıfı dünyanın tam yirmi yıllık ödemesine denk düşmektedir."

"Ek olarak sanık, suç ortaklarının da bulunduğu filoyu gizli bir sisteme sokmak suretiyle kutsal aşarı dönüşü olmayan bir zarara uğratmıştır. Sanık ve avaneleri arasında yaşanan iç çekişmeler sonucunda en az dokuz bin standart birimlik yük taşıyan aşar mavnaları çalınmış veya yok edilmiştir. Bu miktar, Exactis Prima aşar derecesinden üç Alfa sınıfı dünyanın tam yirmi yıllık ödemesine denk düşmektedir."
